text:
The principal, teachers and staff are really warm and friendly. They are incredibly caring and patient with the children. Lots of effort in their day to day lessons, as well as special celebrations. There’s open communication and accountability in the school and I’m so glad to have both my kids in MFS Clementi.

Thank you for your hard work and dedication!

Highly recommended for parents looking very caring teachers and also principal Charmaine who helps us so much in our transition from another center. My kids were very blessed to have attended this childcare. Thank you very much!

We are very pleased with our daughter’s school! She’s always excited and happy to go every morning. In just a few months, we’ve noticed remarkable progress, particularly in her language skills. The teachers are very attentive, supportive, and highly skilled in their approach. We highly recommend this school to other parents!

Well planned Christmas eve party. Start with the dancing even some kids just standing some very active very cute. Then set a few groups do the gift changing after that parents and kid do the handcraft together. Teachers are very nice and patient.
Very well planned Christmas celebration! Games and craft were very suitable for their age group! The kids and parents had lots of fun!
